issue.subject: Rules on resource type bug
issue.description:
The rules on resource type are not well taken into account.
There is an inversion on rules by user, organism category and organsim.

journals.notes:
Hi Thomas,

Are you talking about rules defined in backend (resource type) or rules defined by supplier in front-end (resource, one by one) ?
rules defined in backend "portée" in french

I do not understand. In backend, we only have "rules" with three options :

- public
- organism
- user

I do not see "organism category". See image attached

Are we talking about the same screen ?

Yes we are talking about the same screen.
When the new feature "Organisme category" has been added in EasySDI, the accescope_id changed in the #___sdi_sys_accessscope table (it was not a good practice...)

Before it was :
1 -> public
2 -> organism
3 -> user

After the feature added : 
1 -> public
2 -> organism_category
3 -> organism
4 -> user

We changed this in the code for most of the cases but not for this feature (that doens't take into account organism category feature)

I Thomas !
This issues is marked as "To merge", but I can't find any code related...
Where has it been fixed ?

Thx
